scripts.all: npm run clean:all && npm ci && npm run build:all && npm run pack:all
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:api && npm run clean:dataflows
scripts.clean:api: cd function-apps/api && npm run clean && cd ../..
scripts.clean:dataflows: cd function-apps/dataflows && npm run clean && cd ../..
scripts.build:all: npm run build-common && npm run build && npm run build:api && npm run build:dataflows
scripts.build-common: cd ../common && npm ci && npm run build && cd ../backend
scripts.build:api: cd function-apps/api && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.build:dataflows: cd function-apps/dataflows && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.pack:all: npm run pack:api && npm run pack:dataflows
scripts.pack:api: cd function-apps/api && npm run pack && cd ../..
scripts.pack:dataflows: cd function-apps/dataflows && npm run pack && cd ../..
scripts.start:api: cd function-apps/api && npm run start && cd ../..
scripts.start:dataflows: cd function-apps/dataflows && npm run start && cd ../..
scripts.coverage:ci: npm run use-bash && npm run build-common && npm test -- --coverage
scripts.dependency-cruiser-graphical: current_time=$(date +'%Y-%m-%d_%H%M') && npx depcruise --output-type dot --do-not-follow '^node_modules($|/)' function-apps/api/staff case-assignments case-docket case-history case-summary cases consolidations healthcheck offices orders orders-manual-sync orders-sync ../lib | dot -T svg > ../../docs/architecture/dependency-cruiser/functions/dependency-graph_api_${current_time}.svg
scripts.dependency-cruiser:ci: npx depcruise --output-type err-long function-apps/api/staff case-assignments case-docket case-history case-summary cases consolidations healthcheck offices orders orders-manual-sync orders-sync ../lib
